data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mofidi-Neyestanak, Mohsen, Quicke, Donald L. J. (2007): Eupholidoptera karatolosi sp. n. and E. mirzayani sp. n. (Orthoptera, Tettigoniidae), two new bushcrickets from Greece and Iran. Zootaxa 1562: 43-53, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.178363
